CareerInfo: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English. Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a search for 'lorem ipsum' will uncover many web sites still in their infancy. Various versions have evolved over the years, sometimes by accident, sometimes on purpose (injected humour and the like).

We help retailers adopt digital retail solutions that transform end-to-end operations, free-up capital, improve support services, and keep customers happy.

RetailSolutionsSubText: CogentHub BPO provides excellent cutting-edge solutions and flexible support for all Fashion and retail sectors. We offer innovative retail back office solutions by providing retailers with the correct data to enable in-store associates to engage with customers more successfully. We serve as an extension of your office and help maintain the seamless operation of your company.
EcommerceSolutionsSubText: CogentHub achieves excellence by deploying immaculately planned operations based on our years of experience for E-Commerce Industries. We recognise that today customer service is the defining factor for your brand, and we promise we will excel on this front for you. We offer you cost-effective retail and e-commerce call centre solutions that perfectly suit your customer acquisition and retention requirements. Our contact centre strategies, methodology, latest tools, and technologies make it easier for our retail and e-commerce clients to meet the evolving customer expectations and improve their experience.
TravelTechSolutionsSubText: The travel industry is currently facing significant challenges due to the Covid-19 pandemic, including cut-throat competition, pressure to acquire new customers, retaining customers on the demand side and managing partners and alliances on the supply side. Companies typically outsource travel processes to cut costs and streamline in-house operations. CogentHub delivers superior assistance for your Travel Tech business. Our services include your customer data analytics and monitoring of day to day operations. We can handle bookings and cancellations and provide seamless support to your customers whether they intend to travel for leisure or business.
FoodTechSolutionsSubText: Substantial and frequently changing hurdles stand between food companies and success. A company’s bottom line often is subject to increased costs brought about by the economic recession, natural disasters, fluctuating commodity prices, regulatory changes and changing consumer demands, among other obstacles. To counter the costs of such hurdles and protect their bottom line, food companies of all sizes often outsource business functions such as Office Management, Administrative Functions, Financial Services, Human Resources, and Information Technology (IT). Hiring CogentHub BPO can surprisingly save much money for your FoodTech Business and, at the same time, can provide you with quality work.

Furthermore, there has to be a tight-grip on cost controls without losing productivity, quality and efficiency. Hence we have meticulously designed our international KPO Services product striving to support you with this business front. At CogentHub, we have an excellent understanding of this subject, and we have prepared ourselves to respond to this situation. We offer Back-Office Management services to reduce your operating costs while facilitating efficiency enhancement of your system. We take pride in our extensive industry-based knowledge that empowers us to support you through your customer lifecycles.
FrontOfficeManagementSubTitle: We worked hard to accomplish this in-depth understanding of the industry domain. We offer Front Office management services designed to manage your customer lifecycle efficiently. Our solutions will help you increase your revenue, improve your customer satisfaction and working capital management. It will further help you expand your margins and reduce your churning rates. We state this boldly since our clients across various sectors have encountered better competitive differentiation using our services.
BureauServicesSubTitle: At CogentHub, we extend our services on telecommunications, front office management, call centre and live chat.We provide a world-class service line with affordable solutions for you and your business needs. We'll answer your calls, take a message, make a transfer, or provide any other service you need to ensure you do not miss a single business opportunity.
